headline: How The Story Behind Prudential (LSE:PRU) Is Shifting With The Latest Price Target
summary: The latest update to Prudential's price target marks a fresh chapter in how the market is thinking about this stock, with analysts reframing expectations around its business mix and risk profile. This shift in target reflects a reassessment of the story investors are watching, not just the headline share price. Read on to see how you can keep on top of these kinds of narrative changes as they unfold. Analyst Price Targets don't always capture the full story. Head over to our Company Report to...
